summary: Harald zur Hausen was born in Gelsenkirchen, Germany, 11 March 1936. He is a German virologist and professor emeritus.
full_text: Harald zur Hausen  is a German virologist and professor emeritus. He has done research on cancer of the cervix, where he discovered the role of papilloma viruses, for which he received the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine 2008.
title: Harald zur Hausen
